title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
responsibilities: Migrated an internal web application to Vite.js, significantly improving build times and developer experience.
Developed and maintained new features using React, TypeScript, and Firebase to enhance application functionality and performance.

title: TEST AUTOMATION INTERN
responsibilities: Assisted the automation initiative by developing robust test automation scripts using Robot Framework.
Utilized industry-standard tools and frameworks to ensure comprehensive test coverage and improve software quality.

title: PROGRAMMING TEACHER
responsibilities: Taught students aged 7 to 12 the fundamental concepts of programming and algorithms.
Designed and implemented engaging lessons, using games for younger students and more complete exercises for older ones, to foster logical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: FRONT-END INTERN
responsibilities: Designed and developed a geospatial tool for the Yego team using React.js.
Collaborated with a small team to create a feature that used geospatial coordinates to define accessibility zones for Yego scooters on a map of Barcelona.
Contributed to achieving project objectives in a fast-paced, professional environment.
